description:
Choose your character, gather power-ups, and beat the bosses! Run through the four worlds and face the threat - run, shoot, dodge!
Explore the four islands, each with a unique theme, and beat their challenges. Casual-friendly mechanics, straight forward gameplay, and the unique art style make the perfect, easy-to-grab entertainment.

No time to waste - choose your arsenal, build your character with power-ups, and beat the Mini Island Challenge Bundle!

FEATURES
- power-ups to build your character
- 4 unique islands
- boss-rush
- intense and challenging gameplay
name: Mini Island Challenge Bundle
intro: Mini Island Challenge Bundle is an intense, 2D boss-rush game, that will put your skills to the test!
